title: NasNet Component Generator
description: Generate a React component following NasNet conventions with TypeScript, shadcn/ui patterns, test file, and barrel export

name.description: The name of the component (PascalCase recommended)
name.x-prompt: What is the name of the component?

project.description: The project where the component will be created
project.x-prompt: Which project should the component be added to?

directory.description: The directory path within the project's src folder (e.g., 'components/shared')

dryRun.description: Preview file changes without writing to disk
